threshold_tuning.observation: FSSF distribution: Critical (Wild Card+Discontinuity)=2, High (Driver+Emerging Issue+Precursor)=9, Medium (Trend+Megatrend+Weak Signal)=4. H1 dominance: 13/15 = 87%. H3 = 0. Structural characteristic: Naver News naturally focuses on near-term events. STEEPs: T=5, E=4, P=3, S=2, E_Env=1. Balanced.
threshold_tuning.recommendation: No threshold change. FSSF distribution normal for Korean news media. H3=0 is structurally expected — Naver News covers current events, not speculative futures.

agent_performance.observation: Crawler argument mismatch on first attempt (--date flag not recognized). Correct arguments are --scan-window-start / --scan-window-end. This is the first time this issue was encountered — possible from prior implementation using different flag names. Resolved by running --help.
agent_performance.recommendation: Document correct crawler invocation arguments in SIE log for future reference. Add argument validation to crawler startup.

classification_quality.observation: FSSF + STEEPs dual classification completed for all 15 signals. Tipping Point detection: 1 ORANGE (Iran attack), 3 YELLOW, 11 GREEN. Three Horizons: H1=13, H2=2, H3=0. All 20/20 naver validation checks passed on first attempt.
classification_quality.recommendation: Maintain current FSSF+STEEPs dual classification. Tipping Point ORANGE alert (Iran) correctly escalated.

workflow_efficiency.observation: 268 articles crawled, 266 after dedup (4-stage). 15 signals classified. Dedup rate: 0.75% (2 removed). Phase transitions clean. naver profile 20/20 on first attempt.

hallucination_tracking.observation: All 15 signals trace to Naver News sections (100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105). Signal IDs follow naver-{YYYYMMDD}-{SID}-{NNN} format. 0 ID corruption events. Date anomaly rate: 0% — all within 24h window.

source_exploration.observation: WF3 uses Naver News 6 sections exclusively by design. Source exploration not applicable — WF3 independence enforced.

source_health.observation: All 6 Naver sections responded. 0 blocks detected (S/N=99.63%). Anti-block strategy cascade not triggered. Rate limit (30 rpm) maintained.

minor_proposals.description: Document the correct naver_crawler.py invocation signature in a README or inline help file: 'python3 naver_crawler.py --scan-window-start ISO8601 --scan-window-end ISO8601 --sections ... --scan-tolerance-min N'. The --date flag pattern from older versions is no longer valid.
minor_proposals.evidence: First-attempt argument mismatch today. Prevented by --help lookup, but adds friction.

tipping_point_summary.escalation_watch: If Iran signal reaches RED threshold (공습 실행), cascade to WF1+WF2 cross-validation recommended.

summary: WF3 SIE 2026-02-19: 7개 분석 영역 완료. 자동 적용 변경 0건. 마이너 제안 1건 (크롤러 호출 인수 문서화). 268개 기사 크롤링, FSSF 15신호 분류, ORANGE 1건(이란) 정상 에스컬레이션. 20/20 검증 통과.
